mapper.insert: insert into TEServedPersonExtendFloatingPopulation (ExtendFloatingPersonID, CertifID, FolatingReasonTypeValue, TemporaryResidenceTypeValue, TemporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue, CertificateTypeValue, IdentificationNumber, RegisterDate, DueDate, HouseTypeValue, IsFocusPerson, IsSettled, UnSettledReason, UnSettledDate ) values (#{extendFloatingPersonID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{certifID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{folatingReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{temporaryResidenceTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{identificationNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{houseTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isFocusPerson,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isSettled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{unSettledReason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unSettledDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.update: update TEServedPersonExtendFloatingPopulation set CertifID = #{certifID,jdbcType=CHAR}, FolatingReasonTypeValue = #{folatingReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, TemporaryResidenceTypeValue = #{temporaryResidenceTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TemporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue = #{temporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertificateTypeValue = #{certificateTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, IdentificationNumber = #{identificationNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, RegisterDate = #{registerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DueDate = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, HouseTypeValue = #{houseTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, IsFocusPerson = #{isFocusPerson,jdbcType=BIT}, IsSettled = #{isSettled,jdbcType=BIT}, UnSettledReason = #{unSettledReason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UnSettledDate = #{unSettledDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ExtendFloatingPersonID = #{extendFloatingPersonID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ExtendFloatingPersonID, CertifID, FolatingReasonTypeValue, TemporaryResidenceTypeValue, TemporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue, CertificateTypeValue, IdentificationNumber, RegisterDate, DueDate, HouseTypeValue, IsFocusPerson, IsSettled, UnSettledReason, UnSettledDate from TEServedPersonExtendFloatingPopulation where ExtendFloatingPersonID = #{extendFloatingPersonID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ExtendFloatingPersonID, CertifID, FolatingReasonTypeValue, TemporaryResidenceTypeValue, TemporaryResidencyeReasonTypeValue, CertificateTypeValue, IdentificationNumber, RegisterDate, DueDate, HouseTypeValue, IsFocusPerson, IsSettled, UnSettledReason, UnSettledDate from TEServedPersonExtendFloatingPopulation

select ExtendFloatingPersonID, CertifID, FolatingReasonTypeValue, CertificateTypeValue, IdentificationNumber, RegisterDate, DueDate, HouseTypeValue, IsFocusPerson, IsSettled, UnSettledReason, UnSettledDate from TEServedPersonExtendFloatingPopulation where CertifID = #{certifID}
